name: Bird (itch) (bryanmin)
description:
Bird is a simple but dangerous game about a bird who wants to live against all odds. 

Escape the beast and dodge the traps for as long as you can.

FLAP YOUR WINGS

ESCAPE

DIE

Assets Used:

Bird sprite - dogchicken on OpenGameArt

2D Death Traps - One Point Six Studio

Cute Pets 2D - SR Studios Kerala

Music - Pixabay

"Boo You Suck - RoivasUGO on Freesound
